title: Divided Opinions
itunes:title: Divided Opinions
description:
Boris Johnson is now a vote loser - says former chancellor Philip Hammond - and he should expect his authority to quietly drain away. Speaking to Bloomberg, he also warned of a drip-drip of bad news on the economy over the coming months. But Darlington's Conservative MP, Peter Gibson says the Prime Minister remains popular in constituencies in the North East. Bloomberg's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker also discuss staff shortages and pressures on the NHS, with Donna Hales, a nurse from Sheffield. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

But Darlington's Conservative MP, Peter Gibson says the Prime Minister remains popular in constituencies in the North East. Bloomberg's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker also discuss staff shortages and pressures on the NHS, with Donna Hales, a nurse from Sheffield.
